text: If I Were You is an extended play by Canadian country pop artist David James. It was released on March 13, 2020 via MDM Recordings and Universal Music Canada. It includes the previously released singles "Cars, Girls, And The Radio", "All The Time", and "If I Were You". ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |+Chart performance for singles from If I Were You |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Single ! colspan="1"| Peak chart positions |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! width="45"| CAN Country |- | 2018 | align="left"| "Cars, Girls, And The Radio" | 37 |- | 2019 | align="left"| "All The Time" | 28 |- | rowspan="2"| 2020 | align="left"| "If I Were You" | 40 |- | align="left"| "Then There’s You" | — |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable" |+Release formats for If I Were You ! title: If I Were You (EP)
